===Introduction

This documents covers resizing/initialisation flow in current R3/GUI.

PM - %panel-make.r3
PS - %panel-sizing.r3
PL - %panel-layout.r3

===Simple layout

simple layout is used for testing:

view [button "hello world"]

---Flow

+++Initialisation

PM/make-panel...
  PM/init-panel...
    PS/make-panel-grid
    PS/collect-sizes...
    end
    PS/total-spacing?
    PS/resize-panel...
      PL/layout-panel...
      end
    end
  end
end

+++Resize

Once everything is initialised and we resize the window, we got this chain of operations:

PS/resize-panel...
  PL/layout-panel...
  end
end

===Complex layout

This is more complex layout using two groups:

view [
	panel [button "Hello world" field]
	group 2 [text-area scroller scroller]
]

---Flow

+++Initialisation

PM/make-panel...
  PM/init-panel...
    PS/make-panel-grid
    PM/make-panel2...
      PM/init-panel...
        PS/make-panel-grid
        PS/collect-sizes...
        end
        PS/total-spacing?
        PS/resize-panel...
          PL/layout-panel...
          end
        end
      end
    end
    PM/make-panel2...
      PM/init-panel...
        PS/make-panel-grid
        PS/collect-sizes...
        end
        PS/total-spacing?
        PS/resize-panel...
          PL/layout-panel...
          end
        end
      end
    end
    PS/collect-sizes...
    end
    PS/total-spacing?
    PS/resize-panel...
      PL/layout-panel...
        PS/resize-panel...
          PL/layout-panel...
          end
        end
        PS/resize-panel...
          PL/layout-panel...
          end
        end
      end
    end
  end
end

+++Resize

PS/resize-panel...
  PL/layout-panel...
    PS/resize-panel...
      PL/layout-panel...
      end
    end
    PS/resize-panel...
      PL/layout-panel...
      end
    end
  end
end
